justification: High damage potential from unauthorized CLI commands, moderate reproducibility, medium exploitability, widespread affected users, and low discoverability.
recommendations: Implement strict CLI input validation; Enforce two-factor authentication for CLI access; Monitor CLI command logs for suspicious activity

justification: High damage potential from data corruption, moderate reproducibility, medium exploitability, widespread affected users, and medium discoverability.
recommendations: Encrypt data in transit to external services; Implement integrity checks for API communications; Monitor third-party service logs for anomalies

justification: Severe damage from credential exposure, high reproducibility, medium exploitability, widespread affected users, and medium discoverability.
recommendations: Encrypt sensitive data at rest; Implement role-based access controls; Regularly audit database access logs

threat_title: Denial of Service via External APIs
justification: High damage potential from service disruptions, moderate reproducibility, medium exploitability, widespread affected users, and medium discoverability.
recommendations: Implement API rate limiting; Monitor external service availability; Establish failover mechanisms for critical integrations

justification: Severe damage from command injection, high reproducibility, low exploitability, widespread affected users, and medium discoverability.
recommendations: Implement strict input sanitization; Use parameterized queries for all operations; Conduct regular security testing for CLI inputs
